切罗基保留地的医学院很快将向部落和农村地区派遣医生阿什顿·格洛弗·盖特伍德 (Ashton Glover Gatewood) 在了解到为像她这样的原住民学生设计的新校园后，决定再次尝试医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Medical-school-on-Cherokee-reservation-will-soon-send-doctors-to-tribal-rural-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Medical-school-on-Cherokee-reservation-will-soon-send-doctors-to-tribal-rural-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=491fb5f3-1bdf-4e12-89ea-1fb5035a43e9 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 07:43:14 -0400 Medical school on Cherokee reservation will soon send doctors to tribal, rural areas
州长候选人因赢得阿片类药物和解而争论不休阿片类药物结算现金本质上并不具有政治性。这不是国会通过法律的结果，也不是国家预算编辑的结果。这不是纳税人的钱。相反，它来自因处方止痛药加剧阿片类药物危机而被起诉的医疗保健公司。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Gubernatorial-candidates-quarrel-over-glory-for-looking-opioid-settlements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Gubernatorial-candidates-quarrel-over-glory-for-looking-opioid-settlements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a95b5ca-0dfa-4c79-a149-810679c6bd4e Wed, 01 Nov 2023 07:32:00 -0400 Gubernatorial candidates quarrel over glory for winning opioid settlements

COVID-19期间就业对老年人认知和运动功能的影响严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 爆发期间就业对老年人健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Influence-of-employment-during-COVID-19-on-cognitive-and-motor-functions-among-elders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Influence-of-employment-during-COVID-19-on-cognitive-and-motor-functions-among-elders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9fb81724-f297-4830-b3b2-69a94f8c2e1e Wed, 01 Nov 2023 06:33:00 -0400 Influence of employment during COVID-19 on cognitive and motor functions among elders
研究人员确定了多发性硬化症患者的关键蛋白质生物标志物，为个性化治疗策略铺平了道路研究人员旨在确定多发性硬化症 (MS) 的可靠蛋白质生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Researchers-identify-key- Protein-biomarkers-in-MS-患者-paving-way-for-personalized-treatment-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Researchers-identify-key- Protein-biomarkers-in-MS-患者-paving-way-for-personalized-treatment-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dc7fda8-9fd8-420b-8e9a-b0e58c55678d Wed, 01 Nov 2023 06:01:00 -0400 Researchers identify key protein biomarkers in MS patients, paving way for personalized treatment strategies
从细胞到药物：细胞绘画如何改变药物发现在本次采访中，Jordi Carreras 深入探讨了细胞绘画的迷人世界，这是一项在药物发现领域不断发展的强大技术。他分享了他的开创性研究、Phenaros 药物发现平台的独特之处以及学术界和工业界之间的协同作用的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/From-Cells-to-Drugs-How-Cell-Painting-is-Transforming-Drug-Discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/From-Cells-to-Drugs-How-Cell-Painting-is-Transforming-Drug-Discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d461304-4ae6-47c9-bbba-70da93d38d3f Wed, 01 Nov 2023 05:52:00 -0400 From Cells to Drugs: How Cell Painting is Transforming Drug Discovery
谷物研究的进展揭示了临床环境中精准营养的潜力谷物是饮食中能量（卡路里）的主要来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Advances-in-grain-research-Illuminate-potial-for- precision-nutrition-in-clinical-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Advances-in-grain-research-Illuminate-pottial-for- precision-nutrition-in-clinical-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7af741a6-f582-494d-8ae7-761e3cbdd85e Wed, 01 Nov 2023 05:15:00 -0400 Advances in grain research illuminate potential for precision nutrition in clinical settings
甜蜜的真相：黑加仑和柑橘提取物有助于预防 2 型糖尿病吗？在最近的一项研究中，欧洲研究人员发现黑加仑 (BC) 提取物可以在饭后立即降低血糖水平，但剂量越高并不更有效，而且水果纤维也不会增强效果。尽管存在局限性，该研究为研究控制 2 型糖尿病和血糖水平的饮食干预措施提供了新的方向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Sweet-truths-Could-blackcurrant-and-citrus-extracts-help-prevent-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Sweet-truths-Could-blackcurrant-and-citrus-extracts-help-prevent-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=820d4895-d3fa-454a-be7b-e99c0e0ac6e4 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 00:00:00 -0400 Sweet truths: Could blackcurrant and citrus extracts help prevent type 2 diabetes?
对身体活动的积极态度与降低衰老焦虑有关自2011年以来，美国每天约有10,000人年满65岁。婴儿潮一代和 1946 年之前出生的人构成了美国增长最快的年龄段，到 2035 年，这一群体的人数有望超过儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Positivity-about-physical-activity-linked-to-lower-aging-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231031/Positivity-about-physical-activity-linked-to-lower-aging-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb060a73-6896-4196-9e71-d55525e29cd4 Tue, 31 Oct 2023 23:56:35 -0400 Positivity about physical activity linked to lower aging anxiety
